name: Pengu The Flying Penguin: Unforgettable Chilly Adventure in Frozen Land!
name_original: Pengu The Flying Penguin: Unforgettable Chilly Adventure in Frozen Land!
description:
Who says penguins can't fly? This chilly little guy will defy that!

All he needs is a little help from you! Give him a lift to bounce through the snowy rocky mountains! And catch the passing birds to fly even higher!

But wait…!! Gather as many snowballs and snowmen along the way! Penguin needs those goodies to keep him chilled!

Now, here's your challenge! Can you take him as far as you can while getting many goodies! Remember, passing birds can help this cute penguin flyyyy!!

Look out for the water! You can’t fly down there, and it will melt down your snowballs and snowmen!

Experience the pure fun of flying penguins in this game! Jump, bounce, fly and spin through the air in this colorful and snowy land!

This game features:
» Beautiful graphics!
» Cool sounds!
» Great app suitable for all ages!
» So many levels!
» Jump, bounce, fly and spin through the air!

Note there are no in app purchases in this app but it is advert supported :)

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
